title: ISic000654. I.Sicily inscription 000654
body:
Facsimile Images

Q(uintus) ((·)) He͡rri[us]
Domestic[us]
v(ixit) ((·)) a(nnis) ((·)) XXX[---]
h(ic) ((·)) s(itus) ((·)) M(- - -) ((·)) F(- - -) ((·)) F(- - -) ((·)) C̣(- - -)
5Philetio ((·)) Rhos[i-]
niae ((·)) Grat(ae) ((·)) ser(vus) ((·)) vix(it)
[a]n(nis) ((·)) XIII ((·)) h(ic) ((·)) s(itus) ((·)) Primi-
[tiva] coniugi ((·)) et ((·)) fr-
[atri] ((·)) bene ((·)) meren(tibus) ((·))

Apparatus criticus

text according to Solin 1993, and the photograph provided by Te Riele 1977, pl. 5

translation

commentary
